title: Nic Carter Doubles Down On “NSA Created BTC” Theory

title: Mt. Gox Trustee Extends Repayment Deadline Amidst Ongoing Saga But There’s A Catch
description: The trustee responsible for handling the bankruptcy of Mt. Gox, Nobuaki Kobayashi, has recently announced a significant extension of the repayment deadline for creditors of the now-defunct cryptocurrency exchange.
